content.rendered:
Directed by Sailesh Kolanu

Written by Sailesh Kolanu

Cast Adivi Sesh (Krishna Dev / KD). Meenakshii Chaudhary (Aarya (as Meenakshi Chaudhary)). Rao Ramesh (DGP Nageswara Rao). Tanikella Bharani (Sanjana’s father). Suhas (Kumar). Krishna Murali Posani (News reporter). Komalee Prasad (Varsha). Nani (Arjun Sarkaar). Maganti Srinath (Abhilash). Vishwak Sen (Vikram Rudraraju (archive footage)). Bhanuchander (Vishwanath). Dhaassyam Geetha Bhascker (Aarya’s Mother). Brahmaji (Shinde).DJ Express. Srikanth Iyengar (Raghuvaran). Vinni Mobstaz (Vinni mobstaz). Jaya Naidu (KD’s mother). Kancherpalem Raju (Raghavudu’s Father). Kedar Shankar (KD’s father). Harsha Vardhan (Ram Prasad). Kundan Alexzed (Kundan). Ravi Awana (Ijaz). Bala (KD’s Mother). Adarsh Balakrishna (Karthik). Dhanalakshmi (Saroja). Dr. Giri (SI). Hari (Pooja’s Husband). Keshava (Tea Shop Boy). Yogi Khatri (Ranjith). Sailesh Kolanu (Pub Manager #1). Kranthi Kumar (Constable #2). Klk Mani (Durgamma). Naidu (Constable #3). Divya Narni (Rajitha). Pavani (Shraddha). Pooja (Pregnant Lady). Raghuram (Constable #1). Gayatri Ramana (Madhavi). Neela Ramana (Jhansi). Madhusudhan Rao (DGP). Rehman (Young Kumar). Santhosh (Prabhakar). Majili Shiva (Raghavudu). Sravanthi (Sushma). Srinivas (Pooja’s Husband). Surendra (Home Minister). Temper Vamsi (Ramesh). Anu Varna (Sanjana)

Languages Telugu

Producers S. Venkatarathnam.

Production Wall Poster Cinema. B4U Motion Pictures.
